fields.summary: FairSchedulerTestBase helper methods should call scheduler.update to avoid flakiness

comments.body: [~kasha], looks like something recent broke this

Yeah, looks like some recent change has exposed a timing issue. 

Attached is a patch that seems to fix it. Ran 250 runs with the patch without failure; without the patch it fails in less than 10 runs.

Actually, a better approach might be to call {{scheduler.update()}} right after the {{scheduler.allocate()}} calls in {{FairSchedulerTestBase}}. That should take care of other similar test failures.
